ETYMOLOGY: From Old French contenir, from Latin continere (com- 'together' + tenere 'to hold').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To have or hold (something) within its capacity or volume; to include.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 包含; 容纳; 盛载 (某物)
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: This box contains all the documents you requested.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这个盒子包含了你要求的所有文件。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To restrain or keep within limits; to prevent the spread or development of (something harmful or undesirable).
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 抑制; 克制; 控制 (如情感、疾病或损坏)
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The firefighters struggled to contain the rapidly spreading wildfire.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 消防队员努力控制迅速蔓延的野火。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To be divisible by (another number or measure) a specified number of times.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 可被 (另一数字) 整除 (数学意义上)
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 数字12包含4三次（即12能被4整除3次）。

REGISTER: General usage, formal in the sense of restraint.
